hopobject.name: BeagleLAB
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.0.10) Gecko/2009042523 Ubuntu/9.04 (jaunty) Firefox/3.0.10
hopobject.body:
(1)A PC free host providing a development environment based on beagle board (running ubuntu 9.04 or later)
(2)Host environment with software applications and hardware interfaces to substitute oscilloscope, multimeter & logic analyzers
(3)GNOME widgets (software apps) & Linux device drivers for capturing data ,storing, comparing and visualization
(4)Legacy ports like the serial, parallel ports for device interfacing and control
(5)Making an embedded developer's life easier and workbench neater
hopobject.shortdesc: BeagleLAB is an Embedded developer's workbench comprising of must-have hardware/software utilities.
